attributes.action: BRING BACK HANGING FOR CHILD KILLERS
attributes.additional_details:
There is no detterrent in the British Isles to stop paedophiles and the like murdering children this also applies to people whom take the attitude of living by the gun they shall kill at will by the gun ,and hanging seem to be the only deterrent ,it would be foolish to suggest that bringing back hanging would eradicate such crimes ,but it would certainly cut the incidence and make people think twice .
Why should The Families of victims serve life sentences when the perpetrators serve a mediocre sentence in luxury
why should the British Tax payer have to struggle to make ends meet whilst affoarding perpetrators of crime the luxury of prison cells more akin to luxury hotels
